name: Paddle Force (IhorMDev)
description:
Do you love to play a classical pong game!? Paddle Force is the brand new pong game with many features. 

Move freely on your territory, score goals to capture the whole terrain, and, win! Use power-ups to help you on the way.
Unlock achievements to open new paddles and balls.
Play against a bot or play with a friend. 
Enjoy! :)
